content_markdown:
# Winter's Reflections of Eternity
## Scripture
"For since the creation of the world His invisible attributes, His eternal power and divine nature, have been clearly seen, being understood through what has been made..." - Romans 1:20

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the winter sky, we're reminded of the eternal nature of God. The stars twinkling like diamonds against the dark canvas, the moon's gentle glow, and the constellations' timeless beauty all whisper of a Creator who transcends time and space. Just as the winter season brings a stillness and quiet to the earth, our souls can find rest in the eternal power and divine nature of God. The celestial ballet, with its predictable rhythms and patterns, speaks of a God who is faithful and unchanging.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we ponder the wonders of the winter sky, we're drawn to the eternal nature of Your character. Help us to find rest in Your faithfulness and to trust in Your sovereign plan. Just as the stars shine brightly in the darkness, may our lives reflect the light of Your love and truth. May we, like the constellations, remain steady and unshakeable, pointing others to the eternal hope that is found in You. Amen.
